trans-unit.resname: BFZ·1 | Bane of Bala Ged | Card Name
trans-unit.source: Bane of Bala Ged
trans-unit.target: 巴勒格灾祸

trans-unit.resname: BFZ·1 | Bane of Bala Ged | Card Text | Paragraph 1
trans-unit.source: Whenever CARDNAME attacks, defending player exiles two permanents he or she controls.
trans-unit.target: 每当CARDNAME攻击时，防御牌手放逐两个由他操控的永久物。

trans-unit.resname: BFZ·1 | Bane of Bala Ged | Flavor Text
trans-unit.source: The continent of Bala Ged was ravaged by massive Eldrazi of Ulamog's lineage, its lush jungles and cascading rivers reduced to dust.
trans-unit.target: 钨拉莫孳生的无数奥札奇在巴勒格大陆肆虐，茂密丛林与蜿蜒河流皆尽化为尘土。

trans-unit.source: Blight Herder
trans-unit.target: 枯萎牧体

trans-unit.resname: BFZ·2 | Blight Herder | Card Text | Paragraph 1
trans-unit.source: When you cast CARDNAME, you may put two cards your opponents own from exile into their owners' graveyards. If you do, put three 1/1 colorless Eldrazi Scion creature tokens onto the battlefield. They have "Sacrifice this creature: Add {1} to your mana pool."
trans-unit.target: 当你施放CARDNAME时，你可以将两张由对手拥有的牌从放逐区置入其拥有者的坟墓场。若你如此作，则将三个1/1无色奥札奇／孽裔衍生生物放进战场。它们具有「牺牲此生物：加{1}到你的法术力池中。」

trans-unit.resname: BFZ·3 | Breaker of Armies | Card Name
trans-unit.source: Breaker of Armies
trans-unit.target: 灭军恶体

trans-unit.resname: BFZ·3 | Breaker of Armies | Card Text | Paragraph 1
trans-unit.source: All creatures able to block CARDNAME do so.
trans-unit.target: 所有能够阻挡CARDNAME的生物皆须阻挡之。

trans-unit.resname: BFZ·3 | Breaker of Armies | Flavor Text
trans-unit.source: "There are some who have lost everyone and everything. They actively seek out the Eldrazi, eager for the smallest measure of vengeance."\n—Munda, ambush leader
trans-unit.target: 「丧亲失故、一无所有之人，都会找上奥札奇复仇，机会再小都不会放过。」～伏击领袖蒙达

trans-unit.resname: BFZ·4 | Conduit of Ruin | Card Name
trans-unit.source: Conduit of Ruin
trans-unit.target: 崩毁恶体

trans-unit.resname: BFZ·4 | Conduit of Ruin | Card Text | Paragraphs
trans-unit.source: When you cast CARDNAME, you may search your library for a colorless creature card with converted mana cost 7 or greater, reveal it, then shuffle your library and put that card on top of it.\nThe first creature spell you cast each turn costs {2} less to cast.
trans-unit.target: 当你施放CARDNAME时，你可以从你的牌库中搜寻一张总法术力费用等于或大于7的无色生物牌，展示该牌，然后将你的牌库洗牌，并将该牌置于其上 。你每回合中第一个施放的生物咒语减少{2}来施放。

trans-unit.source: Deathless Behemoth
trans-unit.target: 不亡贝西摩斯

trans-unit.resname: BFZ·5 | Deathless Behemoth | Card Text | Paragraphs
trans-unit.source: Vigilance\nSacrifice two Eldrazi Scions: Return CARDNAME from your graveyard to your hand. Activate this ability only any time you could cast a sorcery.
trans-unit.target: 警戒牺牲两个同时为奥札奇与孽裔的永久物：将CARDNAME从你的坟墓场移回你手上。只可以于你能施放法术的时机下起动此异能。

trans-unit.source: "Over and over it rose. Over and over we fell."\n—Ganda, Goma Fada deserter
trans-unit.target: 「它一再复生。我们一再溃退。」～哥马法达逃亡者甘达

trans-unit.source: Desolation Twin
trans-unit.target: 荒芜双身

trans-unit.resname: BFZ·6 | Desolation Twin | Card Text | Paragraph 1
trans-unit.source: When you cast CARDNAME, put a 10/10 colorless Eldrazi creature token onto the battlefield.
trans-unit.target: 当你施放CARDNAME时，将一个10/10无色奥札奇衍生生物放进战场。

trans-unit.source: "With precise coordination and enough blood spilled, one can be driven off, even brought down. But two . . . that's a lot of blood."\n—Munda, ambush leader
trans-unit.target: 「只要配合默契、不惜流血，我们就能击退，甚至击倒一个。但是两个的话……那得流不少血了。」～伏击领袖蒙达

trans-unit.source: Eldrazi Devastator
trans-unit.target: 毁世奥札奇

trans-unit.resname: BFZ·7 | Eldrazi Devastator | Card Text | Paragraph 1
trans-unit.source: Trample
trans-unit.target: 践踏

trans-unit.source: "No matter how big your champion, theirs is bigger. No matter how great your numbers, theirs are greater. No matter how voracious your appetite, they are hungrier. That is why the Eldrazi will win."\n—Kalitas, thrall of Ulamog
trans-unit.target: 「斗士再强，也强不过它们。人数再多，也多不过它们。胃口再大，也大不过它们。所以奥札奇必胜。」～钨拉莫鬼卒卡力塔

trans-unit.source: Endless One
trans-unit.target: 无尽巨物

trans-unit.resname: BFZ·8 | Endless One | Card Text | Paragraph 1
trans-unit.source: CARDNAME enters the battlefield with X +1/+1 counters on it.
trans-unit.target: CARDNAME进战场时上面有X个+1/+1指示物。

trans-unit.source: It embodies all possible meanings of the word "infinite."
trans-unit.target: 它代表着「无限」的所有含义。

trans-unit.source: Gruesome Slaughter
trans-unit.target: 阴森屠戮

trans-unit.resname: BFZ·9 | Gruesome Slaughter | Card Text | Paragraph 1
trans-unit.source: Until end of turn, colorless creatures you control gain "{T}: This creature deals damage equal to its power to target creature."
trans-unit.target: 直到回合结束，由你操控的无色生物获得「{T}：此生物对目标生物造成伤害，其数量等同于前者的力量。」

trans-unit.source: Though Gideon arrived at Sea Gate too late to prevent the massacre, he still had enough time to lead its survivors to relative safety.
trans-unit.target: 基定赶到海户时，已来不及阻止屠杀，但他仍有时间把幸存者带到相对安全的地带。

trans-unit.source: Kozilek's Channeler
trans-unit.target: 寇基雷通念体

trans-unit.resname: BFZ·10 | Kozilek's Channeler | Card Text | Paragraph 1
trans-unit.source: {T}: Add {2} to your mana pool.
trans-unit.target: {T}：加{2}到你的法术力池中。

trans-unit.source: "In the dark places of our world, something horrible is growing. I fear our foes may be more numerous than we had imagined."\n—Nissa Revane
trans-unit.target: 「在我们世界的暗处，可怖之物正在孳生蔓延。我担心敌人的数量远超我们想象。」～妮莎瑞文

trans-unit.source: Oblivion Sower
trans-unit.target: 夺忆恶体

trans-unit.resname: BFZ·11 | Oblivion Sower | Card Text | Paragraph 1
trans-unit.source: When you cast CARDNAME, target opponent exiles the top four cards of his or her library, then you may put any number of land cards that player owns from exile onto the battlefield under your control.
trans-unit.target: 当你施放CARDNAME时，目标对手放逐其牌库顶的四张牌，然后你可以将任意数量由该牌手拥有的地牌从放逐区在你操控下放进战场。

trans-unit.source: The Eldrazi hunger without limit and consume without pause.
trans-unit.target: 奥札奇饥渴无度，吞噬不绝。

trans-unit.source: Ruin Processor
trans-unit.target: 遗迹噬体

trans-unit.resname: BFZ·12 | Ruin Processor | Card Text | Paragraph 1
trans-unit.source: When you cast CARDNAME, you may put a card an opponent owns from exile into that player's graveyard. If you do, you gain 5 life.
trans-unit.target: 当你施放CARDNAME时，你可以将一张由对手拥有的牌从放逐区置入该牌手的坟墓场。若你如此作，你获得5点生命。

trans-unit.source: The Eldrazi continue to sweep through the wastes, compounding destruction that already seemed absolute.
trans-unit.target: 奥札奇持续扫荡，将夷为平地的废墟彻底毁灭。

trans-unit.resname: BFZ·13 | Scour from Existence | Card Name
trans-unit.source: Scour from Existence
trans-unit.target: 扫除存在

trans-unit.resname: BFZ·13 | Scour from Existence | Card Text | Paragraph 1
trans-unit.source: Exile target permanent.
trans-unit.target: 放逐目标永久物。

trans-unit.resname: BFZ·13 | Scour from Existence | Flavor Text
trans-unit.source: "Our people and our very lands disappear as if they never were. We no longer fight for glory, or honor. We battle now for the right to exist."\n—General Tazri, allied commander
trans-unit.target: 「我们的人民和身处的大地荡然无存。荣耀和荣誉都已不再是我们战斗的目标。我们如今为生存的权利而战。」～盟军指挥官塔兹莉将军

trans-unit.source: Titan's Presence
trans-unit.target: 巨物现身

trans-unit.resname: BFZ·14 | Titan's Presence | Card Text | Paragraphs
trans-unit.source: As an additional cost to cast CARDNAME, reveal a colorless creature card from your hand.\nExile target creature if its power is less than or equal to the revealed card's power.
trans-unit.target: 从你手上展示一张无色生物牌，以作为施放CARDNAME的额外费用。如果目标生物的力量等于或小于所展示之牌的力量，则放逐该生物。

trans-unit.source: Dust and memory are all that remain in Ulamog's wake.
trans-unit.target: 钨拉莫沿途只留下了尘土和回忆。

trans-unit.resname: BFZ·15 | Ulamog, the Ceaseless Hunger | Card Name
trans-unit.source: Ulamog, the Ceaseless Hunger
trans-unit.target: 不休饥渴钨拉莫

trans-unit.resname: BFZ·15 | Ulamog, the Ceaseless Hunger | Card Text | Paragraphs
trans-unit.source: When you cast CARDNAME, exile two target permanents.\nIndestructible\nWhenever Ulamog attacks, defending player exiles the top twenty cards of his or her library.
trans-unit.target: 当你施放CARDNAME时，放逐两个目标永久物。不灭每当钨拉莫攻击时，防御牌手放逐其牌库顶的二十张牌。

trans-unit.resname: BFZ·15 | Ulamog, the Ceaseless Hunger | Flavor Text
trans-unit.source: A force as voracious as time itself.
trans-unit.target: 如同时间般贪噬的力量。

trans-unit.source: Ulamog's Despoiler
trans-unit.target: 钨拉莫掠夺体

trans-unit.resname: BFZ·16 | Ulamog's Despoiler | Card Text | Paragraph 1
trans-unit.source: As CARDNAME enters the battlefield, you may put two cards your opponents own from exile into their owners' graveyards. If you do, CARDNAME enters the battlefield with four +1/+1 counters on it.
trans-unit.target: 于CARDNAME进战场时，你可以将两张由对手拥有的牌从放逐区置入其拥有者的坟墓场。若你如此作，则CARDNAME进场时上面有四个+1/+1指示物。

trans-unit.source: Void Winnower
trans-unit.target: 虚空筛除体

trans-unit.resname: BFZ·17 | Void Winnower | Card Text | Paragraphs
trans-unit.source: Your opponents can't cast spells with even converted mana costs. (Zero is even.)\nYour opponents can't block with creatures with even converted mana costs.
trans-unit.target: 所有对手都不能施放总法术力费用为偶数的咒语。（零是偶数。）所有对手都不能以总法术力费用为偶数的生物进行阻挡。

trans-unit.source: "Have you ever seen a world fall to its knees? Watch, and learn."\n—Ob Nixilis
trans-unit.target: 「你曾否见过连世界本身都屈膝下跪？凝神见证吧。」～欧尼希兹

trans-unit.resname: BFZ·18 | Angel of Renewal | Card Name
trans-unit.source: Angel of Renewal
trans-unit.target: 新机天使

trans-unit.resname: BFZ·18 | Angel of Renewal | Card Text | Paragraphs
trans-unit.source: Flying\nWhen CARDNAME enters the battlefield, you gain 1 life for each creature you control.
trans-unit.target: 飞行当CARDNAME进战场时，你每操控一个生物，便获得1点生命。

trans-unit.resname: BFZ·18 | Angel of Renewal | Flavor Text
trans-unit.source: "No more fear. No more failure. No more death. No more!"
trans-unit.target: 「不复恐惧。不复失败。不复死亡。不复受难！」

trans-unit.source: Angelic Gift
trans-unit.target: 天使赋礼

trans-unit.resname: BFZ·19 | Angelic Gift | Card Text | Paragraphs
trans-unit.source: Enchant creature\nWhen CARDNAME enters the battlefield, draw a card.\nEnchanted creature has flying.
trans-unit.target: 结附于生物当CARDNAME进战场时，抓一张牌。所结附的生物具有飞行异能。

trans-unit.source: "Zendikar will triumph this day, and our armies will fly with angels."
trans-unit.target: 「赞迪卡今日必得胜，全军与天使共翱翔。」

trans-unit.source: Cliffside Lookout
trans-unit.target: 峭壁警戒员

trans-unit.resname: BFZ·20 | Cliffside Lookout | Card Text | Paragraph 1
trans-unit.source: {4}{W}: Creatures you control get +1/+1 until end of turn.
trans-unit.target: {4}{W}：由你操控的生物得+1/+1直到回合结束。

trans-unit.source: Though losses run high among the scouts of the Stone Havens, they never flinch from their duty.
trans-unit.target: 虽然石庇所斥候伤亡惨重，但他们仍能坚守岗位，毫不退缩。

trans-unit.source: Courier Griffin
trans-unit.target: 讯使狮鹫

trans-unit.resname: BFZ·21 | Courier Griffin | Card Text | Paragraphs
trans-unit.source: Flying\nWhen CARDNAME enters the battlefield, you gain 2 life.
trans-unit.target: 飞行当CARDNAME进战场时，你获得2点生命。

trans-unit.source: "Sea Gate has fallen. Survivors are on the move. Will send another griffin when we find refuge. Stay hidden. Stay safe."\n—Message from Tars Olan, kor world-gift
trans-unit.target: 「海户陷落。残部撤离。安身后另派狮鹫。躲好。保重。」～寇族献世子塔斯欧岚的信息

trans-unit.source: Emeria Shepherd
trans-unit.target: 伊美黎牧者

trans-unit.resname: BFZ·22 | Emeria Shepherd | Card Text | Paragraphs
trans-unit.source: Flying\nLandfall — Whenever a land enters the battlefield under your control, you may return target nonland permanent card from your graveyard to your hand. If that land is a Plains, you may return that nonland permanent card to the battlefield instead.
trans-unit.target: 飞行地落～每当一个地在你的操控下进战场时，你可以将目标非地的永久物牌从你的坟墓场移回你手上。若该地是平原，则改为你可以将该非地的永久物牌移回战场。

trans-unit.source: Encircling Fissure
trans-unit.target: 周遭生裂

trans-unit.resname: BFZ·23 | Encircling Fissure | Card Text | Paragraphs
trans-unit.source: Prevent all combat damage that would be dealt this turn by creatures target opponent controls.\nAwaken 2—{4}{W} (If you cast this spell for {4}{W}, also put two +1/+1 counters on target land you control and it becomes a 0/0 Elemental creature with haste. It's still a land.)
trans-unit.target: 于本回合中，防止由目标对手操控的生物将造成之所有战斗伤害。醒转2～{4}{W}（如果你支付{4}{W}来施放此咒语，则另在目标由你操控的地上放置两个+1/+1指示物，且它成为0/0，具敏捷异能的元素生物。它仍然是地。）

trans-unit.source: Expedition Envoy
trans-unit.target: 探险队使节

trans-unit.source: The unofficial motto of every expedition house is "ready for anything," a phrase whose significance has been amplified since the emergence of the Eldrazi.
trans-unit.target: 「有备无患」是每个探险队订立的非正式准则。奥札奇出现后，更加强调了这句话的重要性。

trans-unit.source: Felidar Cub
trans-unit.target: 晶角幼兽

trans-unit.resname: BFZ·25 | Felidar Cub | Card Text | Paragraph 1
trans-unit.source: Sacrifice CARDNAME: Destroy target enchantment.
trans-unit.target: 牺牲CARDNAME：消灭目标结界。

trans-unit.source: Felidars that make it through their first year of life can easily live to see a hundred years more.
trans-unit.target: 活过周岁的晶角兽可安度百年。

trans-unit.source: Felidar Sovereign
trans-unit.target: 晶角兽君王

trans-unit.resname: BFZ·26 | Felidar Sovereign | Card Text | Paragraphs
trans-unit.source: Vigilance, lifelink\nAt the beginning of your upkeep, if you have 40 or more life, you win the game.
trans-unit.target: 警戒，系命在你的维持开始时，若你的总生命为40或更多，你便赢得此盘游戏。

trans-unit.source: It surveys the withering landscape, waiting for a victory only it can see.
trans-unit.target: 它俯瞰凋零的大地，静待只有它能看到的胜利出现。

trans-unit.source: Fortified Rampart
trans-unit.target: 筑防壁垒

trans-unit.resname: BFZ·27 | Fortified Rampart | Card Text | Paragraph 1
trans-unit.source: Defender
trans-unit.target: 守军

trans-unit.source: The refuge's defenses allow new recruits to see lesser Eldrazi up close, steeling their stomachs for what's to come.
trans-unit.target: 避难所的防御工事让新兵能近距离接触小型奥札奇，这能锻炼他们的意志，为将来做好准备。

trans-unit.source: Ghostly Sentinel
trans-unit.target: 魂魅哨兵

trans-unit.resname: BFZ·28 | Ghostly Sentinel | Card Text | Paragraph 1
trans-unit.source: Flying, vigilance
trans-unit.target: 飞行，警戒

trans-unit.source: Mystics of the Stone Havens call upon the spirits of fallen heroes to defend the refuges.
trans-unit.target: 石庇所的秘教徒召集阵亡勇士的灵魂来守卫避难所。

trans-unit.resname: BFZ·29 | Gideon, Ally of Zendikar | Card Name
trans-unit.source: Gideon, Ally of Zendikar
trans-unit.target: 赞迪卡伙伴基定

trans-unit.resname: BFZ·29 | Gideon, Ally of Zendikar | Card Text | Paragraph 1
trans-unit.source: +1: Until end of turn, CARDNAME becomes a 5/5 Human Soldier Ally creature with indestructible that's still a planeswalker. Prevent all damage that would be dealt to him this turn.0: Put a 2/2 white Knight Ally creature token onto the battlefield.−4: You get an emblem with "Creatures you control get +1/+1."
trans-unit.target: +1：直到回合结束，CARDNAME成为5/5，具不灭异能的人类／士兵／伙伴生物，且仍然是鹏洛客。防止本回合中将对他造成的所有伤害。0：将一个2/2白色骑士／伙伴衍生生物放进战场。−4：你获得具有「由你操控的生物得+1/+1」的徽记。

trans-unit.source: Gideon's Reproach
trans-unit.target: 基定的怒责

trans-unit.resname: BFZ·30 | Gideon's Reproach | Card Text | Paragraph 1
trans-unit.source: CARDNAME deals 4 damage to target attacking or blocking creature.
trans-unit.target: CARDNAME对目标进行攻击或阻挡的生物造成4点伤害。

trans-unit.source: "Suddenly, Gideon was there with us, clearing the way so that we could escape."\n—*The War Diaries*
trans-unit.target: 「蓦然间，基定现身与我们并肩作战，为我们清出逃亡之路。」～《战场札记》

trans-unit.resname: BFZ·31 | Hero of Goma Fada | Card Name
trans-unit.source: Hero of Goma Fada
trans-unit.target: 哥马法达勇士

trans-unit.resname: BFZ·31 | Hero of Goma Fada | Card Text | Paragraph 1
trans-unit.source: Rally — Whenever CARDNAME or another Ally enters the battlefield under your control, creatures you control gain indestructible until end of turn.
trans-unit.target: 奋扬～每当CARDNAME或另一个伙伴在你的操控下进战场时，由你操控的生物获得不灭异能直到回合结束。

trans-unit.resname: BFZ·31 | Hero of Goma Fada | Flavor Text
trans-unit.source: "They seek to break us. Let us show them our strength!"
trans-unit.target: 「它们打算击溃我们。让它们瞧瞧我们的厉害！」

trans-unit.source: Inspired Charge
trans-unit.target: 鼓舞冲锋

trans-unit.resname: BFZ·32 | Inspired Charge | Card Text | Paragraph 1
trans-unit.source: Creatures you control get +2/+1 until end of turn.
trans-unit.target: 由你操控的生物得+2/+1直到回合结束。

trans-unit.source: "For the lands you have lost and the beauty that remains, for freedom and the future, we must hold nothing back!"\n—Gideon Jura
trans-unit.target: 「为了失去的土地和残存的美景，为了自由和未来，全力出击！」～基定尤拉

trans-unit.source: Kitesail Scout
trans-unit.target: 航筝斥候

trans-unit.resname: BFZ·33 | Kitesail Scout | Card Text | Paragraph 1
trans-unit.source: Flying
trans-unit.target: 飞行

trans-unit.source: "The wind in one's hair, the sun on one's back, the joy of open skies . . . the next generation of kor must know this kind of peace."
trans-unit.target: 「风起发飞扬，旭日晒背膀，长空乐翱翔……必须让寇族的下一代过上这样的和平生活。」

trans-unit.source: Kor Bladewhirl
trans-unit.target: 旋刃寇族

trans-unit.resname: BFZ·34 | Kor Bladewhirl | Card Text | Paragraph 1
trans-unit.source: Rally — Whenever CARDNAME or another Ally enters the battlefield under your control, creatures you control gain first strike until end of turn.
trans-unit.target: 奋扬～每当CARDNAME或另一个伙伴在你的操控下进战场时，由你操控的生物获得先攻异能直到回合结束。

trans-unit.source: The high-pitched whirl of a hook is the only battle cry she needs.
trans-unit.target: 利钩旋转时发出的呼啸声正是她唯一需要的战嚎。

trans-unit.source: Kor Castigator
trans-unit.target: 惩恶寇族

trans-unit.resname: BFZ·35 | Kor Castigator | Card Text | Paragraph 1
trans-unit.source: CARDNAME can't be blocked by Eldrazi Scions.
trans-unit.target: CARDNAME不能被同时为奥札奇与孽裔之生物阻挡。

trans-unit.source: "He told us not to worry, and he walked into the cavern. The swirling mass of Eldrazi parted to admit him, then closed in his wake."\n—Akiri, kor line-slinger
trans-unit.target: 「他要我们无须担心，随后走进了洞穴。大群奥札奇自动分开让他入内，经过之后又聚拢起来。」～寇族掷索人娅绮丽

trans-unit.source: Kor Entanglers
trans-unit.target: 缠绳寇族

trans-unit.resname: BFZ·36 | Kor Entanglers | Card Text | Paragraph 1

trans-unit.target: 「同诞于此世，携手卫家园，立誓共离别。」

trans-unit.source: Hedron lanterns fend off more than just the darkness.

trans-unit.source: "Even in the hands of amateurs, Nahiri's hedrons can harm the Eldrazi."\n—Ugin

trans-unit.source: Working with his noble mount, he notices every form on the horizon, every scent in the air, every tremor in the earth.
trans-unit.target: 他与尊贵坐骑一道，警戒着地平线上的熙熙攘攘，空气中的丝丝气息，大地下的阵阵颤动。

trans-unit.source: Bone Splinters
trans-unit.target: 碎骨贯身

trans-unit.resname: BFZ·105 | Bone Splinters | Card Text | Paragraphs
trans-unit.source: As an additional cost to cast CARDNAME, sacrifice a creature.\nDestroy target creature.
trans-unit.target: 牺牲一个生物，以作为施放CARDNAME的额外费用。消灭目标生物。

trans-unit.source: Vastly outnumbered, the Zendikari found creative ways to even the odds.
trans-unit.target: 由于人数远远不敌，赞迪卡人用创意巧思拉平差距。

trans-unit.source: Carrier Thrall
trans-unit.target: 带原鬼卒

trans-unit.resname: BFZ·106 | Carrier Thrall | Card Text | Paragraph 1
trans-unit.source: When CARDNAME dies, put a 1/1 colorless Eldrazi Scion creature token onto the battlefield. It has "Sacrifice this creature: Add {1} to your mana pool."
trans-unit.target: 当CARDNAME死去时，将一个1/1无色奥札奇／孽裔衍生生物放进战场。它具有「牺牲此生物：加{1}到你的法术力池中。」

trans-unit.source: "Later we will mourn those we have lost. First we must end their suffering."\n—Drana, Kalastria bloodchief
trans-unit.target: 「日后我们会悼念逝去的同胞。现在的要务是结束他们的痛苦。」～卡列奇血侯哲娜

trans-unit.source: Defiant Bloodlord
trans-unit.target: 无畏血领

trans-unit.resname: BFZ·107 | Defiant Bloodlord | Card Text | Paragraphs
trans-unit.source: Flying\nWhenever you gain life, target opponent loses that much life.
trans-unit.target: 飞行每当你获得生命时，目标对手失去等量的生命。

trans-unit.source: "Despite their bravado, mortals are fragile. If Zendikar is to endure, its lords must save it."\n—Drana, Kalastria bloodchief
trans-unit.target: 「虽然勇猛，但凡人毕竟脆弱。赞迪卡若要长存，其主人必须出手拯救。」～卡列奇血侯哲娜

trans-unit.source: Demon's Grasp
trans-unit.target: 恶魔之攫

trans-unit.source: Target creature gets -5/-5 until end of turn.
trans-unit.target: 目标生物得-5/-5直到回合结束。

trans-unit.source: "Take what solace you can in the knowledge that you will not be here to witness Zendikar's demise."\n—Ob Nixilis
trans-unit.target: 「你应该感到欣慰，因为你活不到见证赞迪卡灭亡的那天了。」～欧尼希兹

trans-unit.resname: BFZ·109 | Drana, Liberator of Malakir | Card Name

trans-unit.resname: BFZ·109 | Drana, Liberator of Malakir | Flavor Text
trans-unit.source: "I will not live as a slave. If you would be free, then fight alongside me."
trans-unit.target: 「我不愿苟活为奴。如果你希冀自由，就与我并肩作战。」

trans-unit.source: "It's hard to find their weak points, but I very much enjoy the discovery process."

trans-unit.resname: BFZ·173 | Giant Mantis | Card Text | Paragraph 1

trans-unit.target: 延势（此生物能阻挡具飞行异能的生物。）

trans-unit.source: "I always thought the great insects of Tazeem were frightening until I saw the Eldrazi. Now I welcome the sight of mantises perched in the treetops."\n—Ryza, Oran-Rief scout
trans-unit.target: 「我一直觉得塔晋的巨型昆虫非常可怕，直到我看见了奥札奇。现在我倒乐于看见匍匐在树顶枝头的螳螂。」～欧兰黎斥候莱莎

trans-unit.resname: BFZ·174 | Greenwarden of Murasa | Card Name
trans-unit.source: Greenwarden of Murasa
trans-unit.target: 姆拉撒育碧灵

trans-unit.resname: BFZ·174 | Greenwarden of Murasa | Card Text | Paragraphs
trans-unit.source: When CARDNAME enters the battlefield, you may return target card from your graveyard to your hand.\nWhen CARDNAME dies, you may exile it. If you do, return target card from your graveyard to your hand.
trans-unit.target: 当CARDNAME进战场时，你可以将目标牌从你的坟墓场移回你手上。当CARDNAME死去时，你可以将它放逐。若你如此作，则将目标牌从你的坟墓场移回你手上。

trans-unit.resname: BFZ·175 | Infuse with the Elements | Card Name
trans-unit.source: Infuse with the Elements
trans-unit.target: 元素注入

trans-unit.resname: BFZ·175 | Infuse with the Elements | Card Text | Paragraph 1
trans-unit.source: Converge — Put X +1/+1 counters on target creature, where X is the number of colors of mana spent to cast CARDNAME. That creature gains trample until end of turn.
trans-unit.target: 聚辉～在目标生物上放置X个+1/+1指示物，X为施放CARDNAME时用来支付费用的法术力颜色数量。该生物获得践踏异能直到回合结束。

trans-unit.resname: BFZ·175 | Infuse with the Elements | Flavor Text
trans-unit.source: "Zendikar has given us the weapons to wage war on the appropriate scale."\n—Najiya, leader of the Tajuru
trans-unit.target: 「赞迪卡赋予了我们足以均势抗敌的武器。」～特裘如领袖娜吉雅

trans-unit.source: Jaddi Offshoot
trans-unit.target: 贾笛旁枝灵

trans-unit.resname: BFZ·176 | Jaddi Offshoot | Card Text | Paragraphs
trans-unit.source: Defender\nLandfall — Whenever a land enters the battlefield under your control, you gain 1 life.
trans-unit.target: 守军地落～每当一个地在你的操控下进战场时，你获得1点生命。

trans-unit.source: On Murasa, even the trees grow trees.
trans-unit.target: 在姆拉撒，就连树也能生出树来。

trans-unit.source: Lifespring Druid
trans-unit.target: 涌生德鲁伊

trans-unit.resname: BFZ·177 | Lifespring Druid | Card Text | Paragraph 1
trans-unit.source: {T}: Add one mana of any color to your mana pool.
trans-unit.target: {T}：加一点任意颜色的法术力到你的法术力池中。

trans-unit.source: "The land is not dead, merely sick. I will nurse it back to health."
trans-unit.target: 「大地未死，只是抱恙。待我调理，让它重返生机。」

trans-unit.source: Murasa Ranger
trans-unit.target: 姆拉撒巡林客

trans-unit.resname: BFZ·178 | Murasa Ranger | Card Text | Paragraph 1
trans-unit.source: Landfall — Whenever a land enters the battlefield under your control, you may pay {3}{G}. If you do, put two +1/+1 counters on CARDNAME.
trans-unit.target: 地落～每当一个地在你的操控下进战场时，你可以支付 {3}{G}。若你如此作，则在CARDNAME上放置两个+1/+1指示物。

trans-unit.source: "If you're not prepared to fight, you'd best be prepared to die."
trans-unit.target: 「如果你还没准备好上阵，希望你已经准备好了后事。」

trans-unit.source: Natural Connection
trans-unit.target: 自然联系

trans-unit.resname: BFZ·179 | Natural Connection | Card Text | Paragraph 1
trans-unit.source: Search your library for a basic land card, put it onto the battlefield tapped, then shuffle your library.
trans-unit.target: 从你的牌库中搜寻一张基本地牌，将之横置放进战场，然后将你的牌库洗牌。

trans-unit.source: "Zendikar will not surrender, and neither can we."
trans-unit.target: 「赞迪卡绝不投降，我们也不会。」

trans-unit.source: Nissa's Renewal
trans-unit.target: 妮莎重光

trans-unit.resname: BFZ·180 | Nissa's Renewal | Card Text | Paragraph 1
trans-unit.source: Search your library for up to three basic land cards, put them onto the battlefield tapped, then shuffle your library. You gain 7 life.
trans-unit.target: 从你的牌库中搜寻至多三张基本地牌，将它们横置放进战场，然后将你的牌库洗牌。你获得7点生命。

trans-unit.source: Her connection to the plane restored, Nissa felt the power of Zendikar surge through her.
trans-unit.target: 妮莎恢复与赞迪卡的联系之后，她感受到时空力量在她全身翻腾。

trans-unit.source: Oran-Rief Hydra

trans-unit.target: 践踏地落～每当一个地在你的操控下进战场时，在CARDNAME上放置一个+1/+1指示物。若该地是树林，则改为在CARDNAME上放置两个+1/+1指示物。

trans-unit.target: {8}：直到回合结束，CARDNAME得+5/+5且获得践踏异能。

trans-unit.source: "The world was not hostile to us—we were beneath its notice, and presented no danger."\n—*The Invokers' Tales*
trans-unit.target: 「这世界对我们没有敌意，我们对它来说不值一顾，且不具危险性。」～《召现师传说》

trans-unit.source: Plated Crusher

trans-unit.source: Trample, hexproof
trans-unit.target: 践踏，辟邪

trans-unit.source: "It might fight the Eldrazi, but don't mistake it for a companion, Gideon. It's not interested in your concept of strength through unity."\n—Najiya, leader of the Tajuru
trans-unit.target: 「基定啊，它可能会对抗奥札奇，但可别把它当做同伴。它对于你众志成城的理念不感兴趣。」～特裘如领袖娜吉雅

trans-unit.source: Plummet
trans-unit.target: 铅直落下

trans-unit.source: Destroy target creature with flying.
trans-unit.target: 消灭目标具飞行异能的生物。

trans-unit.source: The elf's blade carved deep into the Eldrazi drone's fleshy lattices. Without a sound, the drone lost equilibrium and tumbled from the sky.
trans-unit.target: 妖精的利刃深深地刺入奥札奇奴兽的肉身格栅。奴兽悄无声息地失去平衡，从天落下。

trans-unit.source: Reclaiming Vines
trans-unit.target: 复碧藤蔓

trans-unit.source: "This world tires of its long occupation."\n—Nissa Revane
trans-unit.target: 「这世界已厌倦它长据于此。」～妮莎瑞文

trans-unit.source: "If I die, feed me to a shambler. At least that way I'll be doing some good."\n—Ryza, Oran-Rief scout
trans-unit.target: 「如果我死了，就把我喂给跛行兽吧。至少那样，我还算是做了件有用的事。」～欧兰黎斥候莱莎

trans-unit.target: 地落～每当一个地在你的操控下进战场时，CARDNAME得+1/+1直到回合结束。

trans-unit.source: Eldrazi are not the leopard's preferred prey, but they are better than no prey at all.
trans-unit.target: 奥札奇并不是豹最喜爱的猎物，但总比没有猎物好。

trans-unit.target: 检视你牌库顶的四张牌。你可以展示其中的一张生物或地牌，并将它置于你手上。将其余的牌以任意顺序置于你牌库底。

trans-unit.resname: BFZ·189 | Seek the Wilds | Flavor Text
trans-unit.source: "In my downtime I used to paint the vistas. Now the vistas disappear faster than my downtime."
trans-unit.target: 「休工时，我常会描绘风景。如今，风景消逝的速度赶上了我休工的时间。」

trans-unit.source: All of Zendikar's beings sense the upheaval that accompanies the Eldrazi.
trans-unit.target: 赞迪卡的所有生灵都感受到了奥札奇带来的剧变。

trans-unit.source: "Nissa is not the only one with a deep connection to Zendikar's primal elements."\n—Kiora
trans-unit.target: 「妮莎可不是唯一与赞迪卡的原初元素有密切联系的人。」～奇奥拉

trans-unit.source: "As long as there is a single shred of life, there is hope."\n—Nissa Revane
trans-unit.target: 「只要有一丝生命存在，就有希望。」～妮莎瑞文

trans-unit.target: 「我的坐骑无需缰绳也不用辔头。我们有着共同的目标。」

trans-unit.source: "In its time of hardship, all of Zendikar cries out in pain. Are you listening?"
trans-unit.target: 「在此等艰难时刻，赞迪卡的万物痛苦地呼喊。你听到了吗？」

trans-unit.source: Tajuru Warcaller

trans-unit.source: Her rallying cry reaches far beyond the Tajuru elves, inspiring all those who hear it.
trans-unit.target: 她的奋扬战嚎不止激励了特裘如的妖精，还振奋了所有听闻者。

trans-unit.source: Territorial Baloth

trans-unit.source: Landfall — Whenever a land enters the battlefield under your control, CARDNAME gets +2/+2 until end of turn.

trans-unit.source: It knows nothing of Eldrazi or Planeswalkers, just that there are new intruders in its territory.
trans-unit.target: 它才不管是奥札奇或是鹏洛客，只知道领地内有入侵者。

trans-unit.source: "The elements understand better than anyone that actions speak louder than words."\n—Gideon Jura

trans-unit.source: The only traces it leaves are silent gusts and prodigious amounts of wreckage.

trans-unit.resname: BFZ·204 | Forerunner of Slaughter | Flavor Text
trans-unit.source: "While we delay, they're on the move. They will not wait as we bicker. We are losing this war by moments as our goal slips beyond our reach."\n—Gideon Jura
trans-unit.target: 「我们在这耽搁，而它们在行动。它们可不会等我们在这费口舌。战争的局势愈发不妙，目标离我们遥不可及。」～基定尤拉

trans-unit.resname: BFZ·205 | Herald of Kozilek | Flavor Text
trans-unit.source: "Some Eldrazi, their purpose is obvious: suck the life out of the land, birth new Eldrazi. Others aren't so obvious, and those are the ones that make me really nervous."\n—Chadir the Navigator
trans-unit.target: 「有些奥札奇的意图很明显：汲取大地的生机，养育新的奥札奇。而有些则不那么明显，它们才真正让我感到紧张。」～领航者洽迪

trans-unit.target: 虚色（此牌没有颜色。）每当一个地在对手的操控下进战场时，该牌手放逐其牌库顶的两张牌且你抓两张牌。

trans-unit.resname: BFZ·206 | Sire of Stagnation | Flavor Text
trans-unit.source: As the great scourge passed by, Zendikar shivered, then lay silent.
trans-unit.target: 巨型祸害行过，赞迪卡颤抖，随后陷入寂静。

trans-unit.source: Lumbering Falls
trans-unit.target: 林木瀑布

trans-unit.resname: BFZ·239 | Lumbering Falls | Card Text | Paragraph 1
trans-unit.source: CARDNAME enters the battlefield tapped.{T}: Add {G} or {U} to your mana pool.{2}{G}{U}: CARDNAME becomes a 3/3 green and blue Elemental creature with hexproof until end of turn. It's still a land.
trans-unit.target: CARDNAME须横置进战场。{T}：加{G}或{U}到你的法术力池中。{2}{G}{U}：CARDNAME成为3/3绿蓝双色，具辟邪异能的元素生物直到回合结束。它仍然是地。

trans-unit.source: Mortuary Mire
trans-unit.target: 丧葬泥沼

trans-unit.resname: BFZ·240 | Mortuary Mire | Card Text | Paragraphs
trans-unit.source: CARDNAME enters the battlefield tapped.\nWhen CARDNAME enters the battlefield, you may put target creature card from your graveyard on top of your library.{T}: Add {B} to your mana pool.
trans-unit.target: CARDNAME须横置进战场。当CARDNAME进战场时，你可以将目标生物牌从你的坟墓场置于你的牌库顶。{T}：加{B}到你的法术力池中。

trans-unit.source: Prairie Stream
trans-unit.target: 沃原溪流

trans-unit.resname: BFZ·241 | Prairie Stream | Card Text | Paragraph 1
trans-unit.source: ({T}: Add {W} or {U} to your mana pool.)CARDNAME enters the battlefield tapped unless you control two or more basic lands.
trans-unit.target: （{T}：加{W}或{U}到你的法术力池中。）除非你操控两个或更多基本地，否则CARDNAME须横置进战场。

trans-unit.source: The continent of Ondu is a vast plateau crisscrossed by deep trenches and meandering rivers.
trans-unit.target: 昂度大陆这片广袤高原沟壑纵横，蜿流交错。

trans-unit.resname: BFZ·242 | Sanctum of Ugin | Card Name
trans-unit.source: Sanctum of Ugin
trans-unit.target: 乌金圣所

trans-unit.resname: BFZ·242 | Sanctum of Ugin | Card Text | Paragraphs
trans-unit.source: {T}: Add {1} to your mana pool.\nWhenever you cast a colorless spell with converted mana cost 7 or greater, you may sacrifice CARDNAME. If you do, search your library for a colorless creature card, reveal it, put it into your hand, then shuffle your library.
trans-unit.target: {T}：加{1}到你的法术力池中。每当你施放总法术力费用等于或大于7的无色咒语时，你可以牺牲CARDNAME。若你如此作，则从你的牌库中搜寻一张无色生物牌，展示该牌，将它置于你手上，然后将你的牌库洗牌。

trans-unit.source: Sandstone Bridge
trans-unit.target: 砂岩桥

trans-unit.resname: BFZ·243 | Sandstone Bridge | Card Text | Paragraphs
trans-unit.source: CARDNAME enters the battlefield tapped.\nWhen CARDNAME enters the battlefield, target creature gets +1/+1 and gains vigilance until end of turn.{T}: Add {W} to your mana pool.
trans-unit.target: CARDNAME须横置进战场。当CARDNAME进战场时，直到回合结束，目标生物得+1/+1且获得警戒异能。{T}：加{W}到你的法术力池中。

trans-unit.source: Shambling Vent
trans-unit.target: 跛行喷发口

trans-unit.source: CARDNAME enters the battlefield tapped.{T}: Add {W} or {B} to your mana pool.{1}{W}{B}: CARDNAME becomes a 2/3 white and black Elemental creature with lifelink until end of turn. It's still a land.
trans-unit.target: CARDNAME须横置进战场。{T}：加{W}或{B}到你的法术力池中。{1}{W}{B}：CARDNAME成为2/3白黑双色，具系命异能的元素生物直到回合结束。它仍然是地。

trans-unit.target: 弃神祭祠

trans-unit.source: {T}: Add {1} to your mana pool.{T}: Add {2} to your mana pool. Spend this mana only to cast colorless spells. Activate this ability only if you control seven or more lands.
trans-unit.target: {T}：加{1}到你的法术力池中。{T}：加{2}到你的法术力池中。此法术力只能用来施放无色咒语。只能于你操控七个或更多地时起动此异能。

trans-unit.resname: BFZ·245 | Shrine of the Forsaken Gods | Flavor Text
trans-unit.source: The gods known to the merfolk as Ula, Emeria, and Cosi were nothing more than false memories of a monstrous trinity: the Eldrazi titans Ulamog, Emrakul, and Kozilek.
trans-unit.target: 人鱼称为钨拉、伊美黎和寇希的神明，不过是对恐怖三体～钨拉莫、伊莫库和寇基雷这三个庞巨奥札奇的错误记忆。

trans-unit.source: Skyline Cascade
trans-unit.target: 天际瀑布

trans-unit.resname: BFZ·246 | Skyline Cascade | Card Text | Paragraphs
trans-unit.source: CARDNAME enters the battlefield tapped.\nWhen CARDNAME enters the battlefield, target creature an opponent controls doesn't untap during its controller's next untap step.{T}: Add {U} to your mana pool.
trans-unit.target: CARDNAME须横置进战场。当CARDNAME进战场时，目标由对手操控的生物于其操控者的下一个重置步骤中不能重置。{T}：加{U}到你的法术力池中。

trans-unit.source: The continent of Guul Draz is a geothermal swampland reeking of heat and decay.
trans-unit.target: 古坠兹大陆这片地热沼泽热气蒸腾，腐臭弥漫。

trans-unit.target: 孳息温床

trans-unit.source: {T}: Add {1} to your mana pool.{6}, {T}, Sacrifice CARDNAME: Put three 1/1 colorless Eldrazi Scion creature tokens onto the battlefield. They have "Sacrifice this creature: Add {1} to your mana pool."
trans-unit.target: {T}：加{1}到你的法术力池中。{6}，{T}，牺牲CARDNAME：将三个1/1无色奥札奇／孽裔衍生生物放进战场。它们具有「牺牲此生物：加{1}到你的法术力池中。」

trans-unit.source: Young Eldrazi crawl forth from the dust, compelled by a greater will.
trans-unit.target: 幼小的奥札奇在更强大的意志驱使下，自尘土匍匐而出。

trans-unit.source: On the continent of Tazeem, rushing waters plunge through narrow canyons into mist-cloaked lakes.
trans-unit.target: 塔晋大陆上，湍急河水涌经迫窄峡谷，奔腾激流直入雾漫湖泊。
